subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Fans excited to see CAMERON MAYBIN, the Tigers’ 20-year-old rookie outfielder, homer against Roger Clemens in his second major league game undoubtedly expected him to be a star immediately, but with only six games at Class AA, he will need more time to develop. With Detroit in the playoff race, the best-case situation would be for Maybin, above, to contribute the way Miguel Cabrera did for the Marlins as they won the World Series in 2003, but it is more likely that he will develop his power in the coming years.
